---
title: "Association between education and longevity"
author: Casey Breen
---

Summary: This .Rmd file contains code to replicate the "This Study" results in Table 4. It calculates the educational gradient to longevity by fitting a parametric Gompertz model. 

Description of Table 4: Estimates of education gradient across studies

```{r}
## library packages
library(data.table)
library(tidyverse)
library(broom)
library(socviz)
library(cowplot)
library(ggsci)
library(here)
source("helpers.R")
```


```{r}
## read in prelinked CenSoc datasets and filter to "conservative" matches
dmf <- fread(here("data/censoc_dmf_v3_linked_extract.csv")) 

numident <- fread(here("data/censoc_numident_v3_linked_extract.csv"))
```


```{r}
## numident results 
numident_results <-  gompertztrunc::gompertz_mle(death_age ~ educ_yrs, data = numident %>% filter(byear %in% 1910:1920 & sex == 1), left_trunc = 1988, right_trunc = 2005, weights = weight_final)

gompertztrunc::convert_hazards_to_ex(numident_results$results, age = 35)
  
## dmf results 
dmf_results <- gompertztrunc::gompertz_mle(death_age ~ educ_yrs, data = dmf %>% filter(byear %in% 1910:1920), left_trunc = 1975, right_trunc = 2005, weights = weight_final)

gompertztrunc::convert_hazards_to_ex(dmf_results$results, age = 35)
```
